### User Story  

**As a** [type of user]  
**I need** [goal or feature]  
**So that** [reason / value]  

### Acceptance Criteria  
- [ ] Criterion 1  
- [ ] Criterion 2  

### Additional Notes  
(Any technical details, references, etc.)
